Youssouf Djaoro (a mụrụ na 28 Machị 1963) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Chad.
O mere nke mbụ ya site n'ịpụta na ihe nkiri Daresalam n'afọ 2000 ebe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri Tom
Ọ bụ onye a ma ama bụ Issa Serge Coelo duziri ya ma bụrụkwa nke mbụ n'ime ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ha na ha rụkọtara ọrụ
Tartina City, nke Coelo duziri n'afọ 2006 nke Djaoro mere ka onye nta akụkọ meriri Innovation Award na 31st Montreal World Film Festival.
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ 2006 ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Daratt na-arụ ọrụ Nassara

N'ịbụ nke Mahamat Saleh Haroun duziri, Darratt meriri Grand Special Jury Prize na 63rd Venice International Film Festival, yana ihe nrite asatọ ndị ọzọ na Venice na Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou
Maka ọrụ ya na A Screaming Man, Djaoro meriri Silver Hugo maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na 46th Chicago International Film Festival.
